subject: Boxing
Jews and Judaism
Rabbis
lead_paragraph: Yuri Foreman, a boxer and rabbinical student as comfortable with his pugilism as he is committed to his Judaism, will fight Daniel Santos for the W.B.A. title at 154 pounds.
snippet: Yuri Foreman, a boxer and rabbinical student as comfortable with his pugilism as he is committed to his Judaism, will fight Daniel Santos for the W.B.A. title at 154 pounds.
